title: mitilEsha thanaya
sahitya:
mithilEsha tanaya nA mitilEni vetala nIyadhipuna-kerikimpavE O janani 

vyatha jEndu cunnAnu budha vinutuni nA kathavina rammanavE O janani





caraNam 1



 paNDreNDeNDlAyenu bandIkhAnanu jikki bAdhimpucunnAriTu O janani 

taNDri karuNmAne talli nI krpayETlO vENDramAye bratuku O janani

   



caraNam 2



gadamudgarAdula gAsi pondinciri karuNalEka bhaTulu O jananI 

sadayAtmuDItIti sAvakAshamu jEsE santOSamEme nIku O jananI

   



caraNam 3



 parama puruSuDani patita pAvananuDani pANDava pakSuDni O jananI 

karigAci nADani kAnkSinci vEDitE kAlaharaNamu jEsEnE O jananI

   



caraNam 4



 kArAgrahambuna kanugAna rAkanu kaThina shikSala bonditi O jananI 

bhArAkuDitaDani paripari vidhamula brANutinci vEsAriti O janani

   



caraNam 5



 niNDuvEsagini yeNDalO nilipiri guNDumIri O jananI 

koNDanta baruvAyEe moNDi jIvanamu nA daNDa yevvarulErE O jananI 

   



caraNam 6



 uppibiyyamu reNDu nuDaka beTTuga tiniyunnADa nI vidhamuna O jananI 

appaninu dappananyululEru depparamulu dIrpa O jananI

   



caraNam 7



 udayamainavenuka nuraga shayanunitO-DuNDajAla danuvulu O jananI 

sadayAtmuni pampi santarincitivaina sadkIrti dakkunammA O jananI

   



caraNam 8



 tAniSapaikamu taDalEka temmani tahasIlu jeyincagA O jananI 

mAnavAdhamuDavai maniyuNDUTakanna maraNamu mElamma O jananI

   



caraNam 9



 ati dukkhamunu bondiyalasaTacEgundi viSamu O jananI 

patita pAvanunipai bhAramu vEsi prANambula viDicEda O jananI

 



caraNam 10



 parama puruSanuku barikimparAni I pApavu janmamEla O jananI 

karaNatrayambula kAkutstha tilakuni kaNThenayya meruganE O jananI

 



caraNam 11



 epuDaina mIdagu krpajendagalani vapuvuncitIvaraku O jananI 

viparItamu jUDa kapaTAtmulaitiri viphalamu nA bratuku O jananI



caraNam 12



 sthiramuga bhadrAdrikharini sadbhakta shEkharuDai velasi O jananI 

paruvaDi rAmadAsuni brOvakunnanu paruvElAgu dorukanE O jananI
